name: From Scratch Cream of Chicken Soup
author: Tivadoc
summary: A homemade version of the canned classic cream of chicken soup, without the processed parts.
ingredients: 2 cups chicken broth, or more as needed
1 cup all-purpose flour, or more as needed
directions: Combine 2 cups chicken broth, 1/2 cup milk, poultry seasoning, turmeric, onion powder, garlic, paprika, pepper, and cayenne in a saucepan over medium heat; bring to a boil
Combine cream, flour, and remaining milk in a bowl
Add a ladle or two of hot broth mixture and whisk quickly to combine
Pour the mixture back into the saucepan; whisk together and bring to a boil
Add additional broth or flour to adjust consistency
Check seasoning and adjust as needed
